Package ca.mcgill.splendorserver.models.cards

Class Card

java.lang.Object
ca.mcgill.splendorserver.models.cards.Card
public class Card extends Object
Model class for a Splendor development card.

    • getSatchelCount

      public int getSatchelCount()
      Getter for whether the card is associated with a satchel card.
      Returns:
      -1 if it is a satchel card, otherwise the number of associations with a satchel card

    • getCost

      public HashMap<Token,Integer> getCost()
      Getter for the cost of the card.
      Returns:
      a hashmap linking each token colour to its cost

    • equals

      public boolean equals(Card other)
      Compares two card.
      Parameters:
      other - the card to compare to this one
      Returns:
      whether they have the same id given that ids uniquely identify a card
